name: Quality of Life Law
description: Making a revision to add district 78 (sondaica country roads) as an exception for the old growth redwoods protection since we have one of those in the way of the road.

properties.Title: Free Hunting Law
properties.UserDescription: Anyone can harvest and hunt animals on anyone's claim.

Citizen.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen who performed the interaction.

Location.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="ChopTree">Action Location</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="ChopTree">Action Location</ecoicon>: The position where the interaction took place.

Left.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="ChopTree">Growth Percent</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="ChopTree">Growth Percent</ecoicon>: A value of 100 represents a fully grown tree, 0 represents a newly-planted seed.
